articles.title: Sources - Warriors' Andrew Wiggins expected back this week - ESPN India
articles.description: Andrew Wiggins, who has missed 22 straight games while attending to a family matter, is expected to return to the Warriors early this week, sources told ESPN's Adrian Wojnarowski.
articles.content:
Golden State Warriors forward Andrew Wiggins is nearing a return to the team and is expected to be back early this week, sources told ESPN's Adrian Wojnarowski on Monday.

articles.description: Two of the ODIs Ireland were supposed to play in Sri Lanka were replaced by a Test, allowing them to make the switch
